info.name: AnimeTwist Modification Project
info.description: Giving you small but useful tweaks to tailor your AnimeTwist experience
info.additionalInfo:
Video

  big - recommended for animes of the aspect ratio 4:3               
  bigger - recommended for animes of the aspect ratio 16:9  
  biggest - recommended for animes of the aspect ratio 21:9


 Secret

  its reccomended to have Video on default if 
  using bacon and/or applepie mode in order to avoid bugs

options.label: Wide
Bacon mode
Applepie mode
